import api from'./api';// Report related API calls
const reportService={// Get monthly summary report
getMonthlySummary:(year,month)=>{return api.get('/reports/monthly-summary',{params:{year,month}});},// Get detailed report
getDetailedReport:params=>{return api.get('/reports/detailed',{params});},// Get staff performance report
getStaffPerformance:params=>{return api.get('/reports/staff-performance',{params});}};export default reportService;
